demos.text: -Called headquarters again, they report that TFT panel is broken, should be fixed by the end of the week (week 3).

demos.text: But we had paid for bluetooth, and there was none.
The powerpoint opened seamlessly in the apple and the mac hooked up to the projector so easily it was almost scary.
I looked around and based off my price/features comparison from a brand I trusted I landed here.
I took it to friend who temporarily fixed it and I finally paid about 1500 for the extended warranty.
I am however pleased that it is still hanging in there.
I'm stuck w/ a broken computer.
My MacBook is faster than any comparable PC.
It is extremely user friendly and intuitive.
May, the owner always has a smile on her and will warmly greet you.
The display is beyond horrible.
The owner and staff are all Japanese as well and that adds to the entire ambiance.
A tip for people looking into this computer: DO NOT BUY IT save up a bit more money and buy a computer that will last.
This laptop is a great price and has a sleek look.
I have been to Roth's twice and both times were very disappointing.
Very satisfied.
Yes, I have it on the highest available setting.
So I called Compaq, and after being on the phone for 3 hours, i finally got a replacement which I shouldn't have had a problem getting since it was under warranty.
I felt as though I were eating in Paris.
Good bagels and good cream cheese.
